study_name_short: Expanded T cell clones with lymphoma driver somatic mutations accumulate in refractory celiac disease
cell_type_notes: Mutation detected across granulocytes, monocytes, and lymphocytes, indicating a multi-lineage hematopoietic clone consistent with an upstream progenitor origin.”

study_name_short: A triad of somatic mutagenesis converges in self-reactive B cells to cause a virus-induced autoimmune disease
cell_type_notes: Self-reactive, rheumatoid factor–producing B-cell clones in HCV-associated cryovas.

study_name_short: DNMT3A Mutant Clonal Hematopoiesis in VEXAS Syndrome
cell_type_notes: DNMT3A-mutant clonal hematopoiesis in VEXAS; mutations in hematopoietic stem/progenitor compartment.

study_name_short: Activating STAT3 mutations in CD8+ T-cells correlate to serological positivity in rheumatoid arthritis
cell_type_notes: Expanded cytotoxic CD8+ T-cell clones with STAT3 GOF mutations associated with RA seropositivity.

study_name_short: A case of refractory systemic lupus erythematosus with monocytosis exhibiting somatic KRAS mutation
cell_type_notes: Somatic KRAS mutation detected in peripheral blood monocytes in refractory SLE with monocytosis.

study_name_short: Somatic Evolution in Non-neoplastic IBD-Affected Colon
cell_type_notes: Somatic mutations detected in non-neoplastic colonic epithelial cells, consistent with clonal expansion of long-lived epithelial stem cell–derived lineages in chronically inflamed colon

study_name_short: Lymphoma Driver Mutations in the Pathogenic Evolution of an Iconic Human Autoantibody
paper_disease_name: Hepatitis C virus–associated mixed cryoglobulinemic vasculitis
cell_type_notes: B-cell clones producing an iconic rheumatoid factor autoantibody accumulate lymphoma-driver mutations.

study_name_short: Somatic Mutations in UBA1 and Severe Adult-Onset Autoinflammatory Disease (VEXAS Syndrome)
cell_type_notes: UBA1-mutant myeloid progenitor–derived clones driving autoinflammatory VEXAS syndrome.

study_name_short: Somatic inflammatory gene mutations in human ulcerative colitis epithelium
cell_type_notes: Inflammatory-pathway gene mutations (e.g. NFKBIZ) in colonic epithelium from UC patients.

study_name_short: Somatic mutations increase hepatic clonal fitness and regeneration in chronic liver disease
cell_type_notes: Hepatocyte clones with somatic mutations showing increased fitness and contribution to regeneration in chronic liver disease.

study_name_short: Clonal hematopoiesis in patients with rheumatoid arthritis
cell_type_notes: Age-related clonal hematopoiesis (e.g. DNMT3A/TET2) in RA patients, derived from HSC compartment.

study_name_short: Clonal haematopoiesis across the age spectrum of vasculitis
cell_type_notes: Clonal hematopoiesis present in vasculitis patients of different ages; HSC-derived clones.

study_name_short: Frequent somatic mutations of KMT2D (MLL2) and CARD11 genes in primary cold agglutinin disease
paper_disease_name: Primary cold agglutinin disease (autoimmune hemolytic anemia)
cell_type_notes: Clonally expanded mature B cells carrying KMT2D and CARD11 mutations; Recurrent KMT2D and CARD11 mutations in clonal B cells in primary cold agglutinin disease.

study_name_short: Somatic STAT3 mutations in Felty syndrome: an implication for a common pathogenesis with large granular lymphocyte leukemia
cell_type_notes: STAT3-mutant CD8+ large granular lymphocytes in Felty syndrome, similar to T-LGLL biology.

study_name_short: Somatic mutations in clonally expanded cytotoxic T lymphocytes in patients with newly diagnosed rheumatoid arthritis
cell_type_notes: Somatic mutations found in expanded cytotoxic CD8+ T-cell clones at RA onset.

study_name_short: A novel class of somatic mutations in blood detected preferentially in CD8+ cells
cell_type_notes: Somatic mutations enriched in CD8+ T cells, particularly in MS patients compared to controls; functional subtype not specified.

study_name_short: Autoimmune lymphoproliferative syndrome-like disease with somatic KRAS mutation
cell_type_notes: Somatic KRAS mutation driving ALPS-like phenotype with expansion of double-negative αβ T cells; no specific Cell Ontology subclass available, so annotated under parent T-cell class; Note: ALPS-like phenotype due to somatic KRAS mutation (Takagi 2011)
